mentions.context: We used the same text encoder as used by Tacotron 2 to create text embeddings, z text .
We used the same implementation of post-net as the Tacotron 2 system.
The baseline TTS system use system architecture stated in Tacotron 2 [27], with the addition of an expressivity encoder.
For developing fine-grained expressive end-to-end TTS, we modified the multispeaker Tacotron 2 system described in [11].
For training the baseline TTS systems, we used the same model hyperparameters as explained in [16], [18], [27] for implementing the Tacotron 2 system and expressivity encoders based on GST, VAE.
